title: scott pilgrim versus the world
text: Scott pilgrim is in a band and has to defend all his  girlfriend's evil exes to keep her.

title: The fantastic Mr Fox.
text: Mr Fox is a chicken thief turned journalist who went back to stealing after buying a house in the worst neighbourhood in the tri-state area.

title: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist
text: Nick got dumped by a snorty highschooler who is also classmates with Norah who is secretly crushing on Nick's awesome taste in music.
